entry.title: dev-rohitgarg/meme-generator: A web app where users upload an image or select from a library of popular meme templates, then generate funny captions using a lightweight AI model (e.g., fine-tuned GPT-JS or a pre-trained text generator via Hugging Face API). Users can customize text placement, font, and colors, then download or share their meme via a unique URL
entry.content: A web app where users upload an image or select from a library of popular meme templates, then generate funny captions using a lightweight AI model (e.g., fine-tuned GPT-JS or a pre-trained text generator via Hugging Face API). Users can customize text placement, font, and colors, then download or share their meme via a unique URL
